mapper.select: SELECT us.pn, u.name FROM user_seller us LEFT OUTER JOIN users u ON us.pn = u.pn WHERE u.upper_name LIKE #{upperSearchName} AND u.enable = 1 ORDER BY u.name LIMIT #{pagination.itemSeqBegin}, #{pagination.numItemsPerPage}
SELECT COUNT(us.pn) FROM user_seller us LEFT OUTER JOIN users u ON us.pn = u.pn WHERE u.upper_name LIKE #{upperSearchName}

SELECT usp.pn, usp.name FROM user_seller_product usp JOIN partnership p ON p.seller_pn = usp.seller_pn JOIN users u ON u.pn = p.seller_pn JOIN user_seller_contract_info usci ON usp.seller_pn = usci.seller_pn WHERE deleted = 'N' AND u.enable = 1 AND usp.name IS NOT NULL AND CURDATE() BETWEEN usci.start_date AND usci.end_date AND UCASE(usp.name) LIKE #{upperSearchName} LIMIT 30

SELECT ise.pn, ise.category_pn, ic.name AS category_name, ise.name AS name FROM interest_section ise, interest_category ic WHERE ise.category_pn = ic.pn AND ise.upper_name LIKE #{upperSearchName} ORDER BY ic.name, ise.name LIMIT #{pagination.itemSeqBegin}, #{pagination.numItemsPerPage}
SELECT COUNT(pn) FROM interest_section WHERE upper_name LIKE #{upperSearchName} ORDER BY name
